directions.step:
Source: Best Vegetable Recipes from Women's Day, 1980
Put all ingredients in 1 1/2 quart casserole. Cover and bake at 350 for 45 minutes.
Nutrition (per serving): 100 calories, Saturated fat 4 g, Total Fat 6 g (54% of calories), Protein 1 g (6% of calories), Carbohydrates 10 g (40% of calories), Cholesterol 16 mg, Sodium 159 mg, Fiber 1 g, Vitamin A 533 IU, Vitamin C 50 mg.
